hero.title:
SeeDanceTwo
The video model that understands what you mean.
hero.description:
Multimodal creation starts here.
Imagine boldly — leave the rest to it.

introduce.title: What is seedancetwo?
introduce.label: Overview
introduce.description: Seedance two accepts four modality inputs — image, video, audio, and text — for richer expression and more controllable generation.

items.title: Reference Image
items.description: Precisely reproduce composition, character details, and visual style from a reference image.

items.title: Reference Video
items.description: Replicate camera movements, complex motion rhythms, and creative effects from a reference video.

items.title: Video Extension
items.description: Smoothly extend and connect shots — generate continuous scenes guided by your prompts. Not just generation, but "keep shooting."

items.title: Video Editing
items.description: Swap characters, remove or add elements in existing videos with targeted edits.

benefit-1.title: Core Capabilities Significantly Enhanced: More Stable, Smoother, More Realistic!
benefit-1.description: Beyond multimodal, Seedance 2.0 delivers major improvements at the foundational level — more accurate physics, more natural and fluid motion, more precise instruction following, and more consistent style. It handles complex actions, continuous motion, and other challenging generation tasks with ease, making every video more realistic and polished. A true evolution in core capabilities!

benefit-2.title: Full Multimodal Upgrade: Video Creation Enters the "Free Combination" Era!
benefit-2.description: Upload text, images, video, or audio — all can serve as source material or references. Reference any content's motion, effects, style, camera work, characters, scenes, or sound. As long as your prompts are clear, the model understands. Seedance 2.0 = Multimodal reference ability (reference anything) + Strong creative generation + Precise instruction response (excellent comprehension).

benefit-3.title: Overall Consistency Fully Improved
benefit-3.description: Characters looking different between shots, product details lost, small text blurred, scene jumps, inconsistent camera styles... These common consistency issues in creative work are now resolved in 2.0. From faces to clothing to font details, overall consistency is more stable and accurate.

features.title: Core Capabilities
features.description: "Reference ability" is the biggest highlight. Use an image to set the visual style, a video to specify character movements and camera changes, a few seconds of audio to set the rhythm and mood... Combined with prompts, the creative process becomes more natural, more efficient, and more like being a real "director."

items.title: Overall Consistency
items.description: Character faces, outfits, text, and details stay highly consistent across multiple shots.

items.title: Camera & Motion Replication
items.description: Upload a reference video to replicate complex choreography and camera movements — no frame-by-frame descriptions needed.

items.title: Creative Template / Effect Replication
items.description: Creative transitions, ad spots, film clips, and other complex effects can all be precisely reproduced.

items.title: Creative & Story Completion
items.description: The model autonomously completes storylines and creative details, making narratives richer and more natural.

items.title: Video Extension
items.description: Smoothly extend and connect shots — generate continuous scenes guided by prompts. Not just generation, but keep shooting.

items.title: More Accurate Tone, More Realistic Voice
items.description: Natural and lifelike voice timbre with greatly enhanced expressiveness for dialogue and narration.

items.title: Smoother Long Takes
items.description: No breaks in long shots — natural scene transitions with greatly enhanced continuity.

items.title: Highly Usable Video Editing
items.description: Make targeted edits to specific segments of existing videos without regenerating the entire clip.

items.title: Music Beat Sync
items.description: Audio beats align precisely with on-screen actions, giving videos a strong sense of rhythm.

items.title: Better Emotional Performance
items.description: More nuanced facial expressions and body language for stronger narrative impact.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: If you need help, please contact us by email.

items.question: What is seedancetwo?
items.answer: seedancetwo is an AI video generation experience based on the Seedance model, supporting fast creation of cinematic videos.

items.question: Does it support text-to-video and image-to-video?
items.answer: Yes. You can enter prompts for text-to-video, or upload images for image-to-video generation.

items.question: Can it generate multi-shot sequences?
items.answer: Yes. The workflow supports multi-shot storytelling, maintaining scene continuity and style consistency within a single generation.

items.question: Does it support audio-visual synchronization?
items.answer: Yes — the product supports audio-visual synchronization and lip-sync, enhancing the natural feel of videos.

items.question: What output aspect ratios are available?
items.answer: Content can be generated in common ratios including landscape, portrait, and square, suitable for various publishing channels.

items.question: How do I contact the support team?
items.answer: Please email support@seedancetwo.com for configuration and customization support.

cta.title: Start Building Your seedancetwo Experience
cta.description: Build on this quick start and create your own cinematic AI video product.
